Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

Discharges an Arc blast on a single enemy unit, dealing {ArcDamage}[damagewave/] damage with [abilityred]High Impact[/abilityred]. This attack can jump to {ArcJumpTargets} additional targets within {ArcJumpHexes} hexes of each other.
向一个敌人单位释放电弧冲击波，以[abilityred]高度冲击[/abilityred]造成 {ArcDamage}[damagewave/] 伤害。该攻击可弹跳到 {ArcJumpHexes} 个单元格范围内的 {ArcJumpTargets} 个额外目标上。

The Arc Manifold strikes a random enemy unit, dealing {amount} Arc damage and causing [abilityred]High Impact[/abilityred] with a strength {ElectrifiedChance} chance of applying [abilityred]Electrified[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal targets.[br/]Arc Manifold strikes at the start of each enemy turn for {ArcManiDuration}.
电弧流形会随机攻击一个敌人，造成 {amount} 电弧伤害并造成[abilityred]高度冲击[/abilityred]，有 {ElectrifiedChance} 力量几率向非虚灵目标施加[abilityred]触电[/abilityred]。[br/]电弧流形会在每一个敌方回合开始时攻击，持续 {ArcManiDuration}。

Infuse a Mechanical or Cyborg unit with an Aeon Flux Charge. The unit deals {IncreasedDamage} damage and gains [abilityblue]Fast Movement[/abilityblue] for {time}[turn/]. Every turn, the unit has a {danger} chance to become [abilityred]Overloaded[/abilityred] for {OverloadTime}[turn/].
向机械单位或半机械单位注入宇宙乱流。单位可造成 {IncreasedDamage} 伤害并获得[abilityblue]迅捷移动[/abilityblue]，持续 {time}[turn/]。每回合，该单位有 {danger} 的几率变为[abilityred]过载[/abilityred]，持续 {OverloadTime}[turn/]。
This unit deals {IncreasedDamage} damage and has Fast Movement. Every turn, the unit has a {danger} chance to become [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] for {OverloadTime}[turn/].
该单位造成 {IncreasedDamage} 伤害并拥有“迅捷移动”。该单位每回合有 {danger} 几率陷入[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]，持续 {OverloadTime}[turn/]。

The Positron Converter emits a field that flips the electron charge on friendly Arc weaponry. All owned units' Arc abilities can [abilityred]Stun[/abilityred] targets and deal {IncreasedDamage}[DamageWave/] damage for {time}[turn/].
正电转换器会投射一道力场，将电子电荷投向友方电弧武器。所有已拥有的友方单位的电弧技能将会[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]目标并造成 {IncreasedDamage}[DamageWave/]伤害，持续 {time}[turn/]。
This unit deals {IncreasedDamage}[DamageWave/] additional damage and has a {StunChance} strength chance to [abilityred]Stun[/abilityred] targets for {StunDuration}
该单位额外造成 {IncreasedDamage}[DamageWave/]伤害并拥有 {StunChance} 力量几率[abilityred]眩晕[/abilityred]目标，持续 {StunDuration}。

Target Mechanical or Cyborg unit suffers {PulseDisruptionLanceDamage}[wavedamage/] damage and has a strength {PulseDisruptionLanceStrength} chance to be [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred]. If resisted, the unit is [abilityred]Staggered[/abilityred] instead.
目标机械或半机械人单位受到 {PulseDisruptionLanceDamage}[wavedamage/]伤害并有 {PulseDisruptionLanceStrength} 力量几率被[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]。如果被抵抗，则单位将被[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]。

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
